## ğŸ“¦ Installation

### npm (Global)

```bash
npm install -g find-my-domain@X.Y.Z
```

### pnpm (Global)

```bash
pnpm add -g find-my-domain@X.Y.Z
```

### npx (No Installation)

```bash
npx find-my-domain@X.Y.Z --keywords your idea --count 10
```

---

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

```bash
# Set your OpenAI API key
export OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-your-key-here

# Generate domain names
find-my-domain --keywords tech startup --count 10

# Check multiple TLDs
find-my-domain --keywords ai ml --tlds com io dev --count 15
```
